Survey_Page.Title: Consult Evaluation
Survey_Page.Directive: Dr. document.write(top.fieldVals.LASTNAME), you requested a consult for document.write(top.fieldVals.PTNAME) with document.write(top.fieldVals.SPECIALTY) on document.write(top.fieldVals.SUBMIT_DATE). Your patient was seen by Dr.document.write(top.fieldVals.CONSULT_NAME) in document.write(top.fieldVals.SPECIALTY) on document.write(top.fieldVals.CONSULT_DATE). Please answer the following questions about this consultation:

Closed_Question.Name: prefer_consult
Closed_Question.Stem: Was the patient seen by the consultant whom you wanted to see the patient?

Open_Question.Name: no_prefer_consult
Open_Question.Stem: Who did you want to see the patient?

Closed_Question.Name: clinical_perspective
Closed_Question.Stem: From a clinical perspective, did the appointment with the consultant take place when it should have?

Response_Set.Response_Option: The consultation took place when it should have
The consultation did not take place when it should have (e.g. too late or no longer needed)

Open_Question.Name: late_consult_expl
Open_Question.Stem: Please explain why the consult timing was inappropriate and any consequences.

Closed_Question.Name: consult_report
Closed_Question.Stem: Did you see or read the consultant's note for this consultation?

Response_Set.Response_Option: I saw it in CareConnect but I haven't read it yet
I read the note in CareConnect
I received the note outside of CareConnect

Closed_Question.Name: consult_report1
Closed_Question.Stem: Please indicate whether the consultant communicated results of the consultation in any of the other following ways:

Response_Set.Response_Option: Sent a hard copy or fax of the consult note

Open_Question.Name: consult_report1_other
Open_Question.Stem: How did you receive the report of consultation?

Closed_Question.Name: comm_sat
Closed_Question.Stem: How satisfied or dissatisfied were you with communication (if any) concerning the consultation?

Closed_Question.Name: consult_tests
Closed_Question.Stem: Did the consultant order or recommend any tests (e.g., CT scan), procedures (e.g., endoscopy) or referrals?

Response_Set.Response_Option: Yes, and the consultant ordered the tests, procedures or referrals without my input
Yes, and the consultant recommended that I place the orders or offered to place the orders after obtaining my input

Closed_Question.Name: test_order_satisfaction
Closed_Question.Stem: How satisfied or dissatisfied were you with the tests, procedures or referrals ordered by the consultant?

Closed_Question.Name: test_recomm_satisfaction
Closed_Question.Stem: How satisfied or dissatisfied were you with the tests, procedures or referrals recommended by the consultant?

Open_Question.Name: Testing_satis_reasons
Open_Question.Stem: Please describe why you were not fully satisfied with these tests, procedures, or referrals.

Survey_Page.Directive: The following questions ask about the quality of the consultation:

Closed_Question.Name: consult_question
Closed_Question.Stem: Did the consultant address the main problem that prompted the consultation?

Response_Set.Response_Option: Did not address the problem at all

Open_Question.Name: comment_addressed
Open_Question.Stem: If you would like to provide specific information about the consultant's having addressing the consult question, please enter that here.

Closed_Question.Name: consult_helpful
Closed_Question.Stem: How valuable was the information that the consultant did provide?

Response_Set.Response_Option: Not at all valuable for managing the patient
Extremely valuable for managing the patient

Open_Question.Name: helpful_comment
Open_Question.Stem: If you would like to provide specific information about the consult's value, please enter that here.

Closed_Question.Name: consult_cost
Closed_Question.Stem: Did the consultant order tests and make referrals that showed attention to the cost of care? (Leave blank if not sure.)

Open_Question.Name: cost_comment
Open_Question.Stem: If you would like to provide specific information about the consult's attention to cost, please enter that here.

Closed_Question.Name: consult_teach
Closed_Question.Stem: Did the consultation teach you how to better care for this clinical condition?

Closed_Question.Name: consult_qual
Closed_Question.Stem: How would you rate the overall quality of this consultation?

Closed_Question.Name: consult_recom
Closed_Question.Stem: Would you recommend other patients to see this consultant?

Open_Question.Name: suggestions
Open_Question.Stem: What specific suggestions would you have to improve the quality of this consultation or the information that you received?

Invitee_Fields.p: [this paragraph is for an intro for those using the self-start link, which is not used in this project]

salutation.label: Select the saluation to use in email messages to you:

textField.label: Date of query to get completed consults
